actions.text: Amendment SA 1713 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1713 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Specter. (consideration:  CR S11539-11544; text:  CR S11541) To direct the Secretary of the Army to provide technical, planning, design, and construction assistance for the Schuylkill River Park, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1713 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1713 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Specter.

purpose: To direct the Secretary of the Army to provide technical, planning, design, and construction assistance for the Schuylkill River Park, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
